tooltipText:
Release a powerful streak of lightning that hits your primary target and then chains outward to up to 5 nearby enemies from that target, dealing $hit:Mage_ChainLightning_AOE$ to each.

Applies $hit:Mage_Status_Electrified->Shocked.apply0$ to targets with $effect:Status_Electrified.hide$.{skill:Mage:Mage_Passive_ChainLightning_Earth:{effect:Mage_Passive_ChainLightning_Earth.append}}
name: Mage_ChainLightning
